title: Google, Amazon, Walmart-owned PhonePe seek to join RBI's digital currency project: Sources
description: Indian payment firms GooglePay, PhonePe, AmazonPay, and Indian fintech firm Cred are among five companies reportedly seeking to join the Reserve Bank of India's digital currency pilot. The e-rupee, a digital alternative to physical currency, was initially allowed only by banks but has since declined to around 100,000-200,000 a day.
